page.title: 06GAMES WE PLAY IN KINNEFF
page.content: Some of the games we play in the playground or at home are_football, pool,hide_and_seek,high_tig and{ {"Bottle of Poison."} To play{"Bottle of Poison"}you choose two catchers who stand beside each other and hold out their hands with their fingers apart. The other players hold one of the catcher's fingers and get ready to run away from them when they say "Bottle of Poison 1_2_3". The catchers can say "Bottle of Poison 1_2_4",or something like that but they have to say "Bottle of Poison 1_2_3" before they go chasing the players. When they catch you, you must put your arms up against the wall until someone comes and goes under your arms.Then you are free.It is best having a catcher guarding those caught.When everyone is caught then you change catchers.
